features: Gentle Yet Effective: Aroma Magic Neem and Tea Tree Face Wash is a gentle yet powerful cleansing solution designed for acne-prone skin.
Natural Ingredients: Formulated with the goodness of neem and tea tree, it helps combat acne and nourishes naturally.
Skin Hydration: This face wash not only cleanses but also hydrates, leaving your skin feeling refreshed and rejuvenated.
Unique Formula: Our formula ensures a mild and non-drying cleansing experience.
Daily Use: Suitable for daily use, it helps control excess oil.
body.description: Elevate your skincare routine with Aroma Magic Neem and Tea Tree Face Wash, a natural cleansing solution designed especially for those with acne-prone skin. Harnessing the power of neem and tea tree, this face wash helps you achieve a clearer complexion. Our formula ensures a gentle yet effective cleansing experience, removing impurities, excess oil, and makeup without stripping your skin of essential moisture. Embrace the natural goodness of neem and tea tree. Not only does this face wash cleanse your skin, but it also provides essential hydration, leaving your face feeling refreshed and rejuvenated after every use. Incorporate it into your daily skincare routine for a smoother, more radiant complexion. Indulge in a spa-like experience with Aroma Magic Neem and Tea Tree Face Wash and pamper your skin with the natural goodness it deserves. Our commitment to eco-friendly packaging and cruelty-free practices ensures that you're making a responsible choice for your skin and the environment. Transform your skincare routine and say hello to a healthier, acne-free complexion with Aroma Magic Neem and Tea Tree Face Wash Experience the magic of nature on your skin today.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Aroma Magic Neem And Tea Tree Face Wash I am 100% free of paraben, soap, alcohol, artificial colouring & fragrance. I help to cure acne with my neem & rose extracts. I help prevent blackheads and soothe skin irritations with my blend of tea tree & lavender essential oils. The vitamins in me lighten scars, blemishes & improve skin tone. It is absolutely important to clean your face at least twice a day. Pamper your skin to look young and radiant. Cleansing the skin in the morning prevents excess oil production, whereas cleansing the skin before bed prevents dehydration. Our daily exposure to pollution also causes skin problems like wrinkles, breakdown and aging. This is one of the reasons as in why we should cleanse our face.
Benefits Controls acnePrevent blackheads and soothes skin irritationLightens scars, blemishes and improve skin tone

How to use Apply on wet face and neckMassage and rinse off properlyUse every morning and evening Caution Moisturise and apply sunscreen for best resultsAvoid use on dry and sensitive skin Ingredients Essential oils of tea tree and lavenderExtracts of neem and rose

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Z best facewash
reviews.reviewText: Amazing!! I have sensitive skin, along with rosacea & acne. I've tried so, SO many cleansers & I've already established this will be my forever go-to! This stuff works wonders to tone & diminish acne/unevenness, even on the 1st wash, & is natural, which I LoveloveLOVE. I'll end up purchasing repeatedly, I already know!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2015
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great Face Wash, but Small Size
reviews.reviewText: I love this face wash. It's the only face wash that suits my dry/oily combination skin and has kept me blemish free. I also like that it has a small list of ingredients is paraben/SLS free. However, I was not expecting this product to be as small as it was. I would say it's travel size and I've had the full size version before so that was a little disappointing because I'll go through these really fast! Now I know, 50ml is too small!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 27, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Super like this face wash. Good smell and feels soft on skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 19, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Great product, bad packaging
reviews.reviewText: I loved the product. Great fragrance! However, the tube was all squished when I got it. Only half the contents of the tube were left and the rest was all out.

reviews.reviewText: I love this face wash, i have used so many products in the past but this one is perfect for my skin. Making my skin pores tight enough and cleanses the face completely.

reviews.reviewText: It is for oily skin and on body seems fine but dries out my combination skin face, I thought it would smell great with the name Aroma Magic, but it is only okay. Not really strong neem scent but not really floral either. Strong cleaner.

Sure, I can review the Aroma Magic Face Wash (Strawberry) for you. Please note that my review is based on the information available up to September 2021, and there may have been updates or changes to the product since then.Product Overview:Aroma Magic is a well-known brand in the skincare industry, offering a range of natural and herbal products. The Aroma Magic Face Wash (Strawberry) is marketed as a gentle cleanser formulated with natural ingredients, specifically strawberry extracts, to cleanse and refresh the skin.Review:Ingredients: One of the key highlights of the Aroma Magic Face Wash is its use of natural ingredients, particularly strawberry extracts. Strawberries are rich in antioxidants and vitamins, which can be beneficial for the skin. However, it's essential to check the full ingredient list for potential allergens or irritants.Cleansing Performance: The face wash claims to be a gentle cleanser suitable for daily use. Users generally appreciate its ability to remove dirt, oil, and light makeup without over-drying the skin. However, if you wear heavy or waterproof makeup, you might need a separate makeup remover before using this face wash.Fragrance: As the name suggests, the strawberry fragrance is a prominent feature of this product. Most people find it pleasant and refreshing, but if you are sensitive to strong scents or artificial fragrances, this might not be the best option for you.Skin Type: The Aroma Magic Face Wash is marketed as suitable for all skin types, but as with any skincare product, individual experiences may vary. Some users with sensitive skin might find the fragrance or certain ingredients irritating.Packaging: The 100 ml packaging is compact and travel-friendly, making it convenient to carry around.Price: Aroma Magic products are generally reasonably priced and offer good value for money.Effect on Skin: Many users report that this face wash leaves their skin feeling fresh, clean, and soft after use. The strawberry extracts may provide some mild exfoliating properties, but it's not a substitute for a dedicated exfoliator if you need deeper exfoliation.Eco-friendly Aspect: Aroma Magic claims that its products are free from harsh chemicals, parabens, alcohol, and artificial colors. If you prioritize natural and eco-friendly skincare products, this might be a suitable option for you.Conclusion:The Aroma Magic Face Wash (Strawberry) is a popular product among those who prefer natural skincare options and enjoy the refreshing fragrance of strawberries. It offers gentle cleansing and can be suitable for most skin types, but individuals with sensitive skin should do a patch test before regular use. If you're looking for an affordable, natural face wash that provides a fresh feeling without over-drying the skin, this is really a good choice.
Product is very good but fragrance is not much pleasent it works very well for oily skin pimples are cleared after 3 to 4 days it's amazing
